Package org.knime.core.webui.node.view.table.data

Interface Table

public interface Table
Author:
Martin Horn, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany

  • Method Details

    • getDisplayedColumns

      String[] getDisplayedColumns()
      Returns:
      the displayed columns which remain after missing columns are filtered out.

    • getColumnContentTypes

      String[] getColumnContentTypes()
      Returns:
      the content type per column (which depends on the selected renderer per column)

    • getColumnDataTypeIds

      String[] getColumnDataTypeIds()
      Returns:
      the data type ids per column; can be used to access the actual data type via TableViewInitialData.getDataTypes()

    • getColumnFormatterDescriptions

      String[] getColumnFormatterDescriptions()
      Returns:
      the description of the formatters attached to the columns or null where none is attached.

    • getColumnNamesColors

      String[] getColumnNamesColors()
      Returns:
      the color for each displayed column or an empty array when there is no color handler specified.

    • getRows

      List<List<Object>> getRows()
      Returns:
      the requested rows; contains Strings for existing values and can contain nulls or Cells in case of missing values

    • getRowCount

      long getRowCount()
      Returns:
      the row count of the table in use

    • getColumnCount

      long getColumnCount()
      Returns:
      the number of valid selected columns of the table in use. These can be possibly more than the displayed ones if the columns are trimmed.

    • getTotalSelected

      Long getTotalSelected()
      Returns:
      the number of selected rows of the table in use

    • getFirstRowImageDimensions

      Map<String,DataValueImageRenderer.ImageDimension> getFirstRowImageDimensions()
      Returns:
      the column sizes of image columns
